barnilo, afletanda þus frawaurhteis þeinos.
MARK 2.6 wesunuh þan sumai þize bokarje jainar sitandans jah þagkjandans sis in hairtam seinaim:
MARK 2.7 ƕa sa swa rodeiþ naiteinins?
ƕas mag afletan frawaurhtins, niba ains guþ?
MARK 2.8 jah suns ufkunnands Iesus ahmin seinamma þatei swa þai mitodedun sis, qaþ du im:
duƕe mitoþ þata in hairtam izwaraim?
MARK 2.9 ƕaþar ist azetizo du qiþan þamma usliþin: afletanda þus frawaurhteis þeinos, þau qiþan: urreis jah nim þata badi þeinata jah gagg?
MARK 2.10 aþþan ei witeiþ þatei waldufni habaiþ sunus mans ana airþai afletan frawaurhtins, qaþ du þamma usliþin:
MARK 2.11 þus qiþa:
urreis nimuh þata badi þein jah gagg du garda þeinamma.
MARK 2.12 jah urrais suns jah ushafjands badi usiddja faura andwairþja allaize, swaswe usgeisnodedun allai jah hauhidedun mikiljandans guþ, qiþandans þatei aiw swa ni gaseƕun.
MARK 2.13 jah galaiþ aftra faur marein,
jah all manageins iddjedun du imma,
jah laisida ins.
MARK 2.14 jah ƕarbonds gasaƕ Laiwwi þana Alfaiaus sitandan at motai jah qaþ du imma:
gagg afar mis.
Jah usstandands iddja afar imma.
MARK 2.15 jah warþ, biþe is anakumbida in garda is, jah managai motarjos jah frawaurhtai miþanakumbidedun Iesua jah siponjam is;
wesun auk managai jah iddjedun afar imma.
MARK 2.16 jah þai bokarjos jah Fareisaieis gasaiƕandans ina matjandan miþ þaim motarjam jah frawaurhtaim, qeþun du þaim siponjam is:
ƕa ist þatei miþ motarjam jah frawaurhtaim matjiþ jah driggkiþ?
MARK 2.17 jah gahausjands Iesus qaþ du im:
ni þaurbun swinþai lekeis, ak þai ubilaba habandans;
ni qam laþon uswaurhtans, ak frawaurhtans.
MARK 2.18 jah wesun siponjos Iohannis jah Fareisaieis fastandans;
jah atiddjedun jah qeþun du imma:
duƕe siponjos Iohannes jah Fareisaieis fastand, iþ þai þeinai siponjos ni fastand?
MARK 2.19 jah qaþ im Iesus:
ibai magun sunjus bruþfadis, und þatei miþ im ist bruþfaþs, fastan?
swa lagga ƕeila swe miþ sis haband bruþfad, ni magun fastan.
MARK 2.20 aþþan atgaggand dagos þan afnimada af im sa bruþfaþs, jah þan fastand in jainamma daga.
MARK 2.21 ni manna plat fanins niujis siujiþ ana snagan fairnjana;
ibai afnimai fullon af þamma sa niuja þamma fairnjin, jah wairsiza gataura wairþiþ.
MARK 2.22 ni manna giutiþ wein juggata in balgins fairnjans;
ibai aufto distairai wein þata niujo þans balgins, jah wein usgutniþ, jah þai balgeis fraqistnand;
ak wein juggata in balgins niujans giutand.
MARK 2.23 jah warþ þairhgaggan imma sabbato daga þairh atisk, jah dugunnun siponjos is skewjandans raupjan ahsa.
MARK 2.24 jah Fareisaieis qeþun du imma:
sai, ƕa taujand siponjos þeinai sabbatim þatei ni skuld ist?
MARK 2.25 jah is qaþ du im:
niu ussuggwuþ aiw ƕa gatawida Daweid, þan þaurfta jah gredags was, is jah þai miþ imma?
MARK 2.26 ƕaiwa galaiþ in gard gudis uf Abiaþara gudjin jah hlaibans faurlageinais matida, þanzei ni skuld ist matjan niba ainaim gudjam, jah gaf jah þaim miþ sis wisandam?
MARK 2.27 jah qaþ im:
sabbato in mans warþ gaskapans, ni manna in sabbato dagis;
MARK 2.28 swaei frauja ist sa sunus mans jah þamma sabbato.
MARK 3.1 Jah galaiþ aftra in swnagogen,
jah was jainar manna gaþaursana habands handu.
MARK 3.2 jah witaidedun imma hailidediu sabbato daga, ei wrohidedeina ina.
MARK 3.3 jah qaþ du þamma mann þamma gaþaursana habandin handu:
urreis in midumai.
MARK 3.4 jah qaþ du im:
skuldu ist in sabbatim þiuþ taujan aiþþau unþiuþ taujan, saiwala nasjan aiþþau usqistjan?
iþ eis þahaidedun.
MARK 3.5 jah ussaiƕands ins miþ moda, gaurs in daubiþos hairtins ize qaþ du þamma mann:
ufrakei þo handu þeina!
jah ufrakida, jah gastoþ aftra so handus is.
MARK 3.6 jah gaggandans þan Fareisaieis sunsaiw miþ þaim Herodianum garuni gatawidedun bi ina, ei imma usqemeina.
